Title: Kaiseki
Writer: Bryan Fuller (developed for television by), Thomas Harris (characters from the book "Red Dragon"), Bryan Fuller, Steve Lightfoot
Actors: Hugh Dancy, Mads Mikkelsen, Caroline Dhavernas, Hettienne Park
Plot: While Will continues to assert his innocence, Hannibal and Jack try to come to terms with the fact that he's in jail; Kade Purnell visits Will.
